name: Slimy Road
description:
Slimy Road is a Genre mix between  Racing- and Rhythm games with Snails ........and metal!

Prove your Sense of Rhythm and Control your Snail to the Gates of Hell.

Because your Snail is a passionate metal fan he won't respond to you if you are not in sync with the music.

You have to hit the Keys in tact to Move or else you slow down.

Controls:

Space: Forward

Left Arrow: Left

Right Arrow: Right

Music by:  Joshua El-Samalouti
